rev::Shader Class Reference

Class representing an openGL shader @detailed Note that QT's abstraction of the shader program is bizarre... "I can't tell what's worse: that they made setAttributeBuffer a member of a type that has absolutely nothing to do with vertex state" See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37999609/combining-vertex-array-handler-with-vertex-buffer-index-buffer When writing shaders, use the precision rule: More...

Detailed Description

Class representing an openGL shader @detailed Note that QT's abstraction of the shader program is bizarre... "I can't tell what's worse: that they made setAttributeBuffer a member of a type that has absolutely nothing to do with vertex state" See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37999609/combining-vertex-array-handler-with-vertex-buffer-index-buffer When writing shaders, use the precision rule:

  • highp for vertex positions,
  • mediump for texture coordinates,
  • lowp for colors.
